items.text: length ball outside off, driven to deep point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: pushed to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.preText: Time for Rubel Hossain to come into the attack now
items.text: back of a length, angling across on off, pushed past extra cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: too full, and tapped past the bowler gently for a single
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, he cuts it with feet static, went in the air, but dropped short of the man at backward point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bravo, no run

items.text: back of a length again, some movement for the bowler too, but he defends it back confidently
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bravo, no run

items.text: stays in his crease that time and shows the full face of the bat to this fuller length ball, tapping it to mid-off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bravo, no run

items.text: back of a length, angling across, he steers it down to third man
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: past the outside edge once again. In the channel outside off, and defeats Bravo's uncertain prod
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, no run

items.text: fuller ball on the stumps, defended to cover from the crease
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, guides it to point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, no run

items.text: very full on the stumps, Bravo's not taking chances, he defends it back solidly
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, no run

items.preText: Manan: "Bravo knows he's been selected for the ODIs and not the tests right?" - certainly needs to get a move on. Not looked convincing enough so far
items.text: good length angling into the batsman, defended again, towards cover this time
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, no run

items.text: fuller ball, a bit wider outside off, he comes forward to steer it to third man. And that will be drinks
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, 1 run

items.preText:
Russel: "This approach from westindies batsman is alright provided some good hitting in last 10 overs. All they need is to get 170-180 in 40 overs with some wickets in hand." - but to get to 180 at the end of 40 overs, West Indies will have to score about 120 runs in the next 21 overs. That doesn't look likely right now.

Alim: "It's gonna be one of those games where the batsmen let the team down. I've followed our cricket for too long. It doesn't matter if we have 11 in-form players. So if you're excited about it, don't be until the last ball has been bowled, the players have gone home and woke up for breakfast. " - that's a pretty grim view Alim! Bangladesh definitely have had the better of proceedings so far, keeping the run-rate tightly reined in
items.text: dropped by the keeper poked at it, fuller length delivery angling across him. Bravo has been uncertain outside that off stump, and he gets the edge. Rahim dived to his left but couldn't hold on.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: patted back tentatively past the bowler
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, no run

items.text: stays back to punch this confidently to deep cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on the stumps, defended back to the bowler with the full face of the bat
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bravo, no run

items.text: fuller ball on leg stump, he just pats it away into the leg side. Methinks, Bravo needs to be getting a move on, and that should have been put away for a single at least
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bravo, no run

items.text: back of a length on leg stumps, tucks him up, and he defends that towards square leg
items.postText: And handing it back to Hemant
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bravo, no run

items.text: length outside off, defended back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: length outside off, stays in his crease and blocks again
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: fuller outside off, pushes it towards mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: fuller outside off, a cutter perhaps, Bravo looks to go aerial, mistimes it towards long-off where Tamim takes one of the best catches, sprints to his right towards deep extra cover, dives full length and grabs it with both hands, mid-air
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, OUT

dismissal.text: DM Bravo c Tamim Iqbal b Mashrafe Mortaza 19 (51b 1x4 0x6) SR: 37.25

items.preText: Marlon Samuels, but at the other end for now
items.text: back of length, in the rib cage, fended towards square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run
